title: Enzyme-responsive, multi-lock optical probes for molecular imaging and disease theranostics
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,10171-10188
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00335G, Review Article
Penghui Cheng, Kanyi Pu
Enzyme-responsive, multi-lock optical probes exhibit superior detection specificity towards certain biomolecular events and pathological conditions, offering high disease diagnostic accuracy and treatment efficacy.
